meanings: My!, Oh!, Good heaven(s)!, O dear!

vlive.korean: 어마 - 엄마가 맞아요? 어마가 맞아요? Amazing. - How about mom? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86

examples.korean: Prime Minister Kim Hwang-sik unveiled a proposal on how to secure the enormous budget needed for the drastic cut. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 김황식총리는 등록금 인하에 필요한 어마 어마한 예산을 확보하는 방안을 내놓았다. EDU TIMES
